mapper.select: SELECT mbr_cd, grd_cd, mbr_id, mbr_nm, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, mbr_join_ymdt, stc_cd, mbr_agre_yn FROM member order by CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(mbr_cd, 'MB_C', -1) AS UNSIGNED);

SELECT mbr_cd, grd_cd, mbr_id, mbr_nm, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, mbr_join_ymdt, stc_cd, mbr_agre_yn FROM member where stc_cd='SD_ACTIVE' order by CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(mbr_cd, 'MB_C', -1) AS UNSIGNED);

SELECT mbr_cd, grd_cd, mbr_id, mbr_nm, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, mbr_join_ymdt, stc_cd, mbr_agre_yn, COALESCE(DATE_ADD(mbr_last_lgn_ymdt, INTERVAL 2 YEAR), NULL) as withdrawal_expected_date FROM member where stc_cd='SD_WITHDRAWN' order by CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(mbr_cd, 'MB_C', -1) AS UNSIGNED);
mapper.update: UPDATE member set mbr_cd= #{memberCode}, mbr_nicknm = #{memberNickname}, mbr_addr = #{memberAddress}, mbr_daddr = #{memberDAddress}, mbr_zip = #{memberZip}, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt = curdate(), stc_cd = #{statusCode}, grd_cd = #{gradeCode} where mbr_cd= #{memberCode};
